channel.title: Change what NPCs wield
channel.description: I have been trying to change what types of armor and weapons certain npcs wield with no success. Can anyone help me here? I have edited the values in itemwieldabledef how they should be, but no changes :\. Thank you

item.title: Change what NPCs wield
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Server and client will both need to have the npc xml files edited. itemwieldabledef is for players only.

Read full topic
